70010000092291.description:
A wild rain of bouncing rocks crashes down - move fast, blast faster! 

Every rock has a number—hit it that many times and boom! it splits into two rocks with half the number and double the speed, turning the field into fast-moving chaos!

Play solo or with a friend for double firepower. Beat hundreds of levels, survive endless waves, and climb the world leaderboard!

Pick up coins and unlock new cannons: a wide-spread shotgun, a boomerang that swings back and spinning saw blades that slice through rocks as they fall. Upgrade power-ups like a piercing laser beam, explosive drones, and huge shockwaves to wipe out waves in a flash!

Features:
- CO-OP: Team up with a friend and fend off the falling rocks together!
- Online Leaderboards: Survive as long as you can and get the best score in the world!
- Powerful Cannons: Choose between basic, shotgun, boomerang, and saw cannons!
- Devastating powers: Buy and upgrade powerful abilities to destroy everything!
- Special Levels: Defeat epic bosses and protect the bridge from destruction!
- Replayability: Complete hundreds of unique levels and challenges!

The rocks won’t stop bouncing—are you ready to keep blasting?
70010000092291.intro: Dodge falling rocks and blast them all!
70010000092291.name: Ball Blast

70010000097672.description:
Gym Manager is a game where you get to manage, build, and expand your own gym, in opposition to the gym where you were previously employed. After being fired by the gym owner, you decided to get revenge and spend all your savings on opening a new gym, with the goal of making your former boss bankrupt.

As the main mechanic of the game, you will have to manage, build, and expand your gym. You can buy new equipment, upgrade existing ones and sell supplements. You can also expand your gym by demolishing walls, buying new decorations, and opening facilities like a sauna, massage salon, solarium, and locker room. Meanwhile, you must protect your gym from potential danger, keep the gym clean and manage your members.

Outside of managing your gym, you can engage in various activities in town, including flirting with girls, sabotaging the competition gym, partying, buying cheaper equipment in a second-hand store, doing illegal business with a shady guy in the backstreet and lockpicking and stealing from the town while avoiding the police.
70010000097672.name: Gym Manager

70010000100197.description:
War has erupted across a chain of strategic islands. As the sole commander of allied forces, it's your mission to establish forward bases, mobilize your arsenal, and lead a full-scale campaign to eliminate entrenched enemy forces.

In Command Under Fire RTS, you’ll execute real-time tactics across hostile terrain. Construct military camps, secure supply lines, and deploy a wide range of combat assets under your direct command.

Features:

– Strategic Base Building – Establish outposts, reinforce defenses, and expand your military infrastructure to sustain combat operations.
– Diverse Combat Units – Assemble and lead an army of infantry, light and heavy tanks, mobile artillery, combat helicopters, and tactical strike jets. Each unit plays a vital role in the battlefield dynamic.
– Island Campaigns – Launch operations across multiple islands, each with its own terrain, tactical challenges, and enemy resistance. Adapt your strategy to overcome jungle ambushes, mountainous chokepoints, and fortified zones.
– Solo Command. As the lone decision-maker, your leadership determines success or failure in every mission.

Lead from the front. Adapt under fire. Conquer without compromise.
Command Under Fire RTS delivers raw tactical warfare for players who thrive under pressure and lead without hesitation.
70010000100197.intro: Take Command. Build Power. Conquer Islands.
70010000100197.name: Command Under Fire RTS

70010000100415.description:
Every move matters. Drop suggestive emojis and merge them to create bigger, juicier combos. It’s simple, keep it smooth, aim just right, and let things grow.

She’s watching — and the better you play, the more you’ll please her. Satisfy her with every perfect drop.

Features:
- 3 levels with unique shapes.
- A stunning woman to please.
- Awesome, game-changing power-ups.
- Beautiful backgrounds and relaxing music.

Can you handle the pressure?
70010000100415.intro: Merge the right way… and watch her smile.
70010000100415.name: Titi Drop

70050000059138.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock a new town level with a teardrop shaped play area!

Wherever you go, she’s ready for more.
70050000059138.intro: Drop into the city and score the date.
70050000059138.name: Titi Drop: City Date DLC

70050000059140.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock a new town level with a bell shaped play area!

Wherever you go, she’s ready for more.
70050000059140.intro: Drop into the forest and score the date.
70050000059140.name: Titi Drop: Picnic Date DLC

70050000059143.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock a new town level with a cloud shaped play area!

Wherever you go, she’s ready for more.
70050000059143.intro: Drop into the mountains and score the date.
70050000059143.name: Titi Drop: Hiking Date DLC

70050000059488.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Space Station Map
- Red Planet Map
- Wasteland Map
- 15 Saw Thrower Shards   
- 10 Barrier Shards    
- 10 Cannon Shards    
- 4 Extra Damage Boosters
- 4 Fast Charge Boosters
- 2500 gems

Wherever you go, the rocks keep falling.
70050000059488.intro: A brand new worlds to blast!
70050000059488.name: Ball Blast: Space DLC

70050000059490.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Haunted Castle Map
- Candy Land Map
- Vaporwave Map
- 15 Boomerang Shards   
- 10 Shock Wave Shards    
- 10 Laser Shards     
- 6 Extra Cannon Boosters
- 2500 gems

Wherever you go, the rocks keep falling.
70050000059490.intro: A brand new worlds to blast!
70050000059490.name: Ball Blast: Dreamland DLC

70050000059491.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Desert Map
- Runic Map
- Frozen Map
- 15 Shotgun Shards    
- 10 Turret Shards    
- 10 Plasma Cannon Shards    
- 10 Shield Boosters
- 2500 gems

Wherever you go, the rocks keep falling.
70050000059491.intro: A brand new worlds to blast!
70050000059491.name: Ball Blast: Wilds DLC

70070000029457.description:
Showcase your style and become a supermodel in one of the best shopping games! 

No matter what your fashion style may be, this shopping mall has exactly what you're looking for! Get a fabulous new hairstyle at your favorite hair salon Chic Cuts, and dress up in the latest hot trends from our stylish shops!   

Features: 
- Dress up in beautiful outfits and become a star! 
- Show off your unique style on the cover of a magazine! 
- Battle against other clients for low-in-stock clothing! 
- Shop in a brand new premium store: Surf'N Style!
- Put on over 750 clothes, 125 accessories and more than 100 makeup items!
- Use 8000 additional coins to help you buy them all!
- Make sure your nails are perfect and complement them with rings and bracelets! 
- Enhance your hair with beautiful styles and vibrant colors! 

It's Black Friday! The excitement is real as you race to grab the clothes you need before they vanish from the shelves! Dress up in shirts, skirts, shoes, and accessories, or get expert advice from your personal shopper!  

Step into the spotlight and compete in a fashion battle, vote for your favorite fashion show looks, and strive to become the ultimate fashion show superstar! 

Get set for an unforgettable shopping adventure like no other!
70070000029457.intro: Dress up in fabulous outfits and walk the runway like a pro!
70070000029457.name: Shopping Mall Girl: Sunny Edition

70070000029508.description:
Get ready for action with a vacuum so strong, even the laws of physics are nervous. Suck up everything in sight - boxes, animals, enemies… basically, if it’s not bolted down, it’s going in!

But that’s just the beginning. At the end of each level, it’s payback time! Fire everything you’ve collected straight at bosses, towers, and anything unlucky enough to stand in your way. It’s not personal. It’s vacuum justice.

Features:
• 6 New Skins - Vacuums shaped like a cash register, firehose, engine, flowerpot and other total mysteries. Is that one made of toxic waste? Maybe. Why not.
• Suck It All In - Enemies, crates... even elephants! This vacuum breaks records, physics, and probably warranty terms.
• Epic Boss Fights - Giant enemies. Flying objects. Extreme chaos. Maximum satisfaction.
• Smash Castles - No catapult? No problem. Your vacuum launches stuff like a pro.

Dodge obstacles, suck shiny gems, and unlock new vacuum styles that prove cleaning up can look cool too. The more you suck, the more fun it gets!

Nothing is safe from the Super Sucker! Seriously. Hide your stuff.
70070000029508.intro: Suck it all in… then launch it like a maniac with a cannon!
70070000029508.name: Super Sucker: Complete Edition

70010000102014.description:
Welcome to Seashell Isle, a vibrant and mysterious adventure where every corner of the island holds secrets waiting to be uncovered. Set foot on a forgotten, sacred land rich with history, magic, and untold treasures. Once a thriving sanctuary of ancient guardians, the island now calls to brave explorers seeking wonder and glory.

Venture through lush jungles, windswept beaches, and mist-covered cliffs as you uncover hidden vaults, forgotten passageways, and long-lost relics. Each location on Seashell Isle tells a story.

Features:
Explore a handcrafted island full of secrets
Discover hidden vaults, passageways, and ruins
Piece together the island’s mysterious history
70010000102014.intro: The island is waiting. What will you discover?
70010000102014.name: Seashell Isle

70010000039111.description:
Meet Buddy and Bag Boy - two tiny robots with big hearts and an even bigger mission: spreading joy wherever they go! After a mysterious explosion rains golden cogs and trash from the sky, the duo must work together to restore each village and uncover the secret behind the blast. Scrub mess, collect trash, and lend a helping hand as you explore a familiar world from a tiny perspective.

Beneath the surface lies a touching tale that deepens as you meet new bots. From UFOs and secret lovers to unlikely heroes and dancing instruments, you’ll discover a world full of quirky characters with stories worth hearing.

- Explore backyards, playgrounds, and forgotten areas in a mysterious post-human world.
- Clean, repair, and make a meaningful difference in each area you visit.
- Interact with lovable robots made from everyday items as you help them with their struggles.
- Find golden cogs, coins, and hidden treasures tucked away in every nook and cranny.
- Experience a heartfelt narrative that mixes humor with real emotion.


Being small never felt so big.
70010000039111.intro: Make a BIG difference as a TINY robot!
70010000039111.name: Misc. A Tiny Tale

70010000094781.description:
Guide Noor, an apprentice lightkeeper, through impossible monuments, shifting landscapes, and tranquil seascapes to uncover the Sacred Light and save her home.

Monument Valley 3 takes you beyond the monuments and into the open sea. As Noor, you’ll navigate stunning, changing environments, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the Sacred Light. With her village threatened by rising tides, Noor must chart her own course—and discover her own strength—in this stunning, emotional adventure.

Sail between geometry, manipulate architecture to reveal hidden paths, and let the iconic soundtrack guide you forward. With new mechanics, breathtaking visuals, and the series' signature charm, Monument Valley 3 is a voyage like no other.

Features:

- Defy Perspective: Rotate and manipulate the environment to reveal hidden paths, solve intricate puzzles

- Uncover The Mystery: Help Noor unlock the secrets of this ever-changing world.

- Beautiful Art: A stunning world inspired by modern design, global architecture and hand-crafted, personal stories.

- Every Update Included: Full Story is included, with brand new updates to come

Adventure awaits—will you uncover the light that guides the way?

ustwo games are proud independent developers, best known for the award-winning Monument Valley series, Land’s End, Assemble with Care and Alba: A Wildlife Adventure.
70010000094781.intro: Set sail for adventure in MONUMENT VALLEY 3, a brand new story in the award-winning Monument Valley series.
70010000094781.name: Monument Valley 3

70010000095177.description:
The Multiverse is collapsing! Team up, jump into your spaceship, and face chaos—disasters, frantic repairs, and intense battles. Every mission in Hyperspaced is unique, and only teamwork will save the galaxy!

Pilot, Engineer, Gunner, or Janitor – Every Role Matters!
Steer the ship, man the turrets, extinguish burning consoles, patch up hull breaches, and mop up sticky space goo before everything spirals out of control. In this fast-paced co-op madness, no one gets to sit back and relax!
Mission: Retrieve the Galaxy Plugs!
Some lunatics have stolen the cosmic Galaxy Plugs, leaving the universe tangled in a mess of chaotic pipelines! Your crew must track down the thieves, recover the Plugs, and restore balance before entire galaxies vanish forever.
Friends, Foes, and… a Space Octopus?!
On your journey, you’ll encounter bizarre beings: a mysterious drone, a grumpy hermit, a talkative merchant octopus – and cats?! Help them (or don’t), but some might just join your reckless adventure!
Procedurally Generated Galaxies – Every Run is Unique!
No two adventures are the same! Explore ever-changing maps, discover new ships, and unlock crazy upgrades. Restore abandoned vessels to their former glory and experience different playstyles – from heavily armored freighters to nimble space raiders.
Don't Forget to Feed Scrappy!
Your junk-eating robot turns scrap into valuable resources mid-mission. Just make sure to pet him – he gets cranky otherwise!
So, buckle up – this is going to be a wild ride!

Key Features:
•	1–4 Player Local Co-Op – Maximum chaos guaranteed!
•	Multitasking Madness – Repair the ship inside while battling enemies outside in an innovative split-screen view
•	Infinite Replayability – Randomized maps, ships, and wacky weapons keep every run fresh
•	Build & Upgrade Your Ship – Customize your spaceship with new modules, weapons, and defenses
•	4 different ships with different layouts and gameplay mechanics to unlock
•	Boss Battles & Epic Challenges – Only the best crews will survive!
70010000095177.intro: The Ultimate Co-Op Chaos in Space!
70010000095177.name: Hyperspaced

70010000099438.description:
Find the hidden kitties around the office! Secret Paws - Cozy Offices is an isometric hidden object game themed around cats and colourful workspaces. Explore unique, adorably decorated cube-shaped rooms as you search for dozens of cleverly obscured felines lying around each stage.

Rotate the room to get a better view between obstacles, move the cursor and click on each cat that you discover, gradually reducing the counter in the top-left of the screen. Secret Paws - Cozy Offices is calm, casual and therapeutic with a soothing soundtrack to match, making it the perfect “anytime” experience!

• Find the cats hidden in colourful isometric office cubes!
• Unlock new rooms of gradually increasing complexity.
• Rotate the office cubes to change your viewpoint and avoid obstructions!
• Click on the cleverly placed felines to reduce the cat counter to zero.
70010000099438.intro: Solve feline-themed hidden object challenges in cute cube-shaped isometric offices!
70010000099438.name: Secret Paws - Cozy Offices

70010000085266.description:
『DORONKO WANKO』 is a DORONKO Action Game.
In this game, you can become a cute, innocent pup and make a big mess inside the house.
Choose your favorite from six dog breeds — Pomeranian, Shiba-Inu, Bulldog, Toy Poodle, Jack Russell Terrier, and Corgi.
Let's explore this beautiful house and make it dirty and muddy at will!

◆ Rub! Splash! Muddy Action
A cute pup can get muddy by “rubbing” against the mud spread on the floor.
Then release it all with a “splash” and make the whole area muddy and messy!

◆ Sometimes you can find "hidden pome" when you are spreading mud all over the house.
When you find all the "hidden pome", the "Good Smell Room" 's door will open.
(Let's go inside quietly before others notice!)

◆ More mud, more damage!
You can check the total amount of damage you have caused from the ending “Receipt”.

◆ Dirty all and get plenty of gifts!
When you cause enough damage, you will receive a “gift”?!
They will help the pups’ exploration (and cuteness!)  by making it easier to splash mud and obtain key items.
70010000085266.intro:
Be a playful pup and make a big mess at home!
"Will mom get mad at me?"
Don't worry — you're just a sweet little doggie!
70010000085266.name: DORONKO WANKO

70010000085857.description:
Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions is a fast-paced racing game for the whole family that brings the famous Europa-Park mascots Ed & Edda to life for the first time in a video game to coincide with the worldwide release of the animated feature film ‘GRAND PRIX OF EUROPE’!

You can race with the two heroes or six other colourful characters that fans of the film will recognise! The races take players to various well-known locations across Europe to compete in Free Races, the Points Chase, Time trial or the Grand Prix!

Each character not only has their very own racing car, but also individual strengths and weaknesses, which means that each race can be driven very differently depending on which character you take to the track!

But Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions is not just a game that is great fun to play alone: in a race with two, three or even four players, every family and every group of friends can create their very own memories in the world of the Racing Champions - because with Ed & Edda, too, it's true: a shared game is often twice the fun!

 
Key features of Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions:

Race over exciting tracks in many world-famous European locations

Choose between eight well-known characters, including Ed & Edda, the legendary Europa-Park mascots

Unleash unique driving skills, master power-ups and customise your race car to make every race feel unique

Long-term modifications to the racing car and unlockable improvements keep the replay value high

A split-screen mode for local multiplayer races of 2 to 4 players invites families to have fun together and create their very own memories in the world of Ed & Edda.
70010000085857.name: Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX – Racing Champions

70010000087499.description:
This new and improved version of Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S includes a variety of new features!
Work alongside Miku and other Piapro characters to solve these unique puzzles!

Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S+ New Features
Multiple new puzzles have been added to the previous title!
In addition to the Normal Puzzles and all-new illustration-based Special Puzzles,
you can also update the appearance of each Piapro character, and even customize your room to your liking.

◇Immerse yourself in the puzzle-solving action with more than twice the content of the previous game, including more than 1,000 new puzzles!
Try your hand at 10x10, 15x15, and even 20x20 puzzles!
Complete stages with each character to unlock new costumes, room items, and even more gorgeous artwork!
In addition to the 75x75 Special Puzzles from the previous game, this updated version includes even more challenging 100x100 puzzles as well!
There are also more than 30 illustrations from popular illustrators to enjoy!

◇New Features! Change your characters' costumes and freely customize your room as you take on these puzzles with your favorite characters!
Just like the last game, Miku and the other Piapro characters will cheer you on as you solve these challenging puzzles!
Best of all, this game has added all-new costume and room editing features!
Dress up the characters in various outfits and rearrange your room in order to better enjoy your puzzle-solving adventures!

◇Includes special fan-made songs officially chosen by Piapro!
The game includes 30 songs that were specially selected from fan submissions!
Complete the puzzle missions and collect “stars” along the way!
Collect enough stars to unlock new songs! ♪
You can enjoy your puzzles while listening to your favorite songs on the home and puzzle screens!

◇What is Hatsune Miku Logic Paint?
Use the numbers above and to the left of the puzzles as hints to color in the appropriate squares and complete the illustration to solve them!
The handy "X" feature lets you block out squares to keep track of those that shouldn't be colored in.
You can always review the basic rules within the game if you ever need a refresher course!
70010000087499.intro: Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S+ is coming to Nintendo Switch™!
70010000087499.name: Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S+

70010000089530.description:
Acrana Famiglia is an autonomous organization that protects the small island of Regalo in the Mediterranean Sea. 
Those who belong to the Famiglia have a mysterious power called Arcana, which they use to protect the island from outside enenmies. 
Felicita (main character/name can be changed), the only daughter of the organization's boss Mondo, has only just taken her first steps as a member of the family.
April 1st. It's Mondo's birthday. At a party thrown for him by the family, he makes a surprising announcement.

Mondo: "Two months from now...June 1. We'll hold the Arcana Duello!"
Mondo: "The winner of the Duello will become the leader of the organization...and as the new Papa, they will wed my daughter."

This is Felicita's story, as she fights to win the Arcana Duello in order to change her own destiny.

Felicita: "My path...is for me to decide."

・"Arcana Famiglia -La storia della Arcana Famiglia- Ancora", a game based on the concept of a Otome game × Shonen manga, originally available on the PS Vita in 2015, will be ported to the Nintendo Switch™!

・The game progresses with a comic-like storyline that uses colorful illustrations called the Comiaru system. The game also features the unique Cocoaru System, which allows you to read the minds of other characters!

・Enjoy character designer and original artist Yomi Sarachi's beautiful CG illustrations in full HD quality!
The story is brought to life by a talented cast of voice actors including Jun Fukuyama, Tsubasa Yonaga, Hiroyuki Yoshino, Tomokazu Sugita, Yuichi Nakamura, Jurota Kosugi, and Koji Yusa!
70010000089530.intro: This is a story of destiny and bonds centered around Felicita, the daughter of the boss of Arcana Famiglia.
70010000089530.name: Arcana Famiglia Rinato

70010000092570.description:
★ WELCOME TO TRANSPORTER ★
A solo platform racing game — technical and competitive.

★ THE CONCEPT :
Choose from 3 types of vehicles: Classic, Amphibious or Military.
Your mission: deliver your cargo while avoiding obstacles and reaching the finish line with at least one item intact.

★ TECHNICAL GAMEPLAY :
Choose the right vehicle
Adjust your speed
Maintain your balance
Analyse the terrain and overcome obstacles

★ AVAILABLE WORLDS :
Indy Jungle: ideal for 4x4 vehicles
Operation Overlord: combat-focused, perfect for military vehicles

★ VEHICLES :
Unlock 19 unique vehicles
• Classics (versatile)
• Amphibious (faster on water)
• Military (armoured, capable of shooting)

★ GARAGE :
Tune 5 parameters: power, suspension, grip, brakes, fuel tank
Special options: armour, handling, electromagnetism…

★ CARGO :
Unlock 11 types of goods to deliver.

★ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS :
Compare your score with other players in each race thanks to online leaderboards.
70010000092570.intro:
★ Drive, Master, Deliver ★
Race against the clock to transport goods across varied and dangerous environments.
70010000092570.name: Transporter

70010000099226.description:
There's no time to think! You just have to run for your life! Every second counts, so it's important to keep up the pace.

Stay alert and wait for the right moment to change direction, so you can keep running. Use your brain to avoid the danger. The Giant never stops - it's his goal to smash you! You can win — use different tactics for the various situations you encounter. Take the risk and escape the Giant! 

Seize your opportunity and try to survive this deadly race — run fast and avoid the obstacles. Show no fear! Running is the only option. 

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Run, boy, run! You can do it!
70010000099226.intro: Run for your life and never look back!
70010000099226.name: Giant Flee

70010000099844.description:
Noah's Dilemma is a crew-building strategy roguelike set in a reinvented mythology of Noah's Ark inspired by Magical Realism, featuring unique placement-centric gameplay inspired by sudoku and autochess.

■ Playtime
A successful run typically takes around 2 to 5 hours to complete, with 5 to 10 attempts expected before beating the game for the first time.

■ Build Your Animal Crew
Embark on a journey to gather animals who will also serve as your sailors. Harness their abilities, ignite synergies, and turn your ark into a swift vessel.

■ Explore Wild Islands
Sail through a procedurally generated map, venturing to untamed islands filled with hidden treasures, hot springs, altars, villages, and more.

■ Battle the Coral-Born
The Coral-Born are hostile creatures that emerged after the Great Flood. Command your animal crew to defend the ark from their relentless assaults.

■ Conquer the Four Seas
Each of the Four Seas is ruled by a formidable boss. Defeat them all, bring every animal onboard to the promised land, and claim your title as the conqueror of the Four Seas.

■ More Challenges Await
After victory, unlock 2 new playable characters, face 6 tougher quests, and activate a 10-level challenge mode designed for veteran players.

■ Play First, Lore Later
Noah’s Dilemma emphasizes gameplay first, presenting its story in a minimalist style. Still, every element in the game is carefully crafted to fit into a rich, coherent world, leaving room for lore-seekers to uncover its deeper mysteries.

■ Features
- Four sea areas to conquer, each with its own traits and governing boss.
- Three playable characters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.
- 50+ creatures, ranging from familiar mammals to deep-sea inhabitants.
- 50+ encounters and events randomly woven into your adventure.
- 50+ animal natures and abnormalities to trigger risks and thrills.
- 50+ animal effects with abundant variations and synergies.
- 150+ items and relics designed for strategic play.
- 1 core mission, 6 extra quests and a 10-level challenge mode.
- A fresh and engaging 10-hour experience for all players, with many more hours for those looking to complete the game and master every detail.
70010000099844.name: Noah's Dilemma

70010000101680.description:
Sharpen your mind as you search for hidden gems and treasure chests tucked away in everyday scenes.
This picture puzzle game is both relaxing and brain-stimulating — perfect for all ages!

Easy to play：
・Read the clue carefully to see what you're looking for
・Scan the photo to spot the hidden item
・Tap the item before time runs out!

Some objects might seem easy to find at first glance…
but with the clock ticking, it’s more of a challenge than you’d think!

No worries if time runs out — you can try as many times as you like.

Need a hand?
Tap the hint button to get a subtle clue about where to look!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000101680.intro:
Hunt for hidden treasures in each picture!
A fun and brain-boosting item search game for all ages
70010000101680.name: Picture Treasure Hunt

70010000101799.description:
This game lets you train your brain while enjoying adorable underwater illustrations.
Your task is to find the designated fish hidden in the picture within the time limit.

How to Play：
・Carefully check the image of the fish you need to find
・Look for that fish in the underwater scene
・When you find it, tap it before time runs out!

Some fish may seem easy to find at first glance…
but the time limit adds an unexpected challenge!

If you ever get stuck, don’t worry—
the hint button will gently guide you by pointing out the general area.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000101799.intro:
Where’s That Fish Hiding?
A Cute and Easy Brain-Training Picture Hunt Game
70010000101799.name: Peek a Fish!

70050000056807.description:
Jamboree TV is a new way to play that's all about audience participation! Take on a variety of challenges along with Mario and friends. Let the games begin!

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
Super Mario Party Jamboree for Nintendo Switch required to use this upgrade pack, sold separately.
70050000056807.intro: A super-charged celebration for Nintendo Switch 2
70050000056807.name: Super Mario Party Jamboree – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV upgrade pack

70010000088025.description:
Iris the internet idol has been abducted by aliens?!
Finding herself on board a mysterious UFO and tasked with completing a bizarre escape game, Iris knows there's one person who she can always count on for help: Kaname Date, Psyncer! 
As Date, conduct investigations, solve escape game puzzles, and Psync into the dreams of potential suspects to help Iris escape and unravel the mystery behind The Third Eye Game!

・ Investigation: Use the special functions in Date's left eye to gather information that will lead to Iris's whereabouts! Familiar and new characters will also appear!
・Somnium: Explore the eccentric dream world of potential suspects to uncover clues and secret memories!
・ Escape: Solve thrilling mysteries while exploring a locked environment. When you find the true answer beyond the surface level of logic, the door to escape will open!
70010000088025.intro: Open Your Third Eye To Seek A Way Out!
70010000088025.name: No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES

70010000093077.description:
Play as Tulock, a snow fox, and help him progress through the different levels of this puzzle game based on movement on a hexagonal grid.

Slide in a straight line to an obstacle or the edge across 100 levels and find the right path to the final hexagon, avoiding the traps.

Discover new mechanics in the various worlds of increasing difficulty without fear of getting stuck, thanks to the help included in the game.

And for those wanting extra difficulty, over 250 optional challenges spread across the levels are present.


Features:
* 100 levels spread over 12 worlds,
* Hexagonal grid requiring different thinking,
* 10 mechanics added as the game progresses,
* Increasing difficulty, with in-game help included (solutions),
* Ability to undo moves if you make a mistake,
* More than 250 optional challenges spread over 100 levels.
70010000093077.intro: Help Tulock reach the final hexagon
70010000093077.name: TERASLIDE

70010000093152.description:
Game Features:
A short story fusing romance, school life, thriller, and magical realism (approx. 2 hours playtime, multiple endings)
Psychedelic and vibrant neo-flat illustration art style depicting a surreal world
Dreamlike yet eerie original soundtrack with immersive sound design
Synopsis:
As an 18-year-old student at a magical boarding school, "I" made a fateful decision: to trade my heart to a witch in an occult ritual.
The witch's ritual granted all my desires – adoring crowds, unprecedented status, and a grand romance. But the crowds turned faceless, power became a viper's nest, and love... How could I possibly respond to his affection... when I had no heart left to feel?
70010000093152.intro: To gain the love of all people, would you dedicate your own heart?
70010000093152.name: Zero-Sum Heart

70010000096193.description:
Past a Trail of Delusions
and Roger is an interactive novel that lets you see through the protagonist's eyes—whether what she sees makes sense or not. It is comprised of three chapters and can be played in its entirety in about one hour.

Story
It's just another morning for this young girl. She wakes up and starts getting herself ready while shaking off the sleepiness like always. Except something, somehow, feels off.

When she steps into the living room, she expects to find her dad preparing for work. Instead, she finds a stranger sleeping on the couch.
The man wakes up, looks at the girl, and sighs. Ignoring her confusion, he mumbles to himself with a hint of sadness in his voice.

It's really time to get ready.

Scared, the girl runs. She must leave the house.
"She doesn't know who this man is or where her father has gone.

Walk alongside her on this twisting, twisted path and see where it will lead her."
70010000096193.intro: It was a morning like all others until she realized her dad wasn't home. In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she takes her medicine. Who is he?
70010000096193.name: and Roger

70010000096337.description:
Welcome to Tiny Titans – Card Rumble, where epic RPG battles meet adorable chibi charm! Step into a world of fast-paced strategy and build your ultimate deck of tiny heroes, each with unique powers and big personalities. Whether you prefer knights, mages, healers, or rogues—there’s a Titan for every playstyle.
Engage in exciting card-based battles on a 3x3 board, placing heroes that attack, heal, or unleash powerful effects the moment they’re played. Once activated, they stay on the field, holding the line with their defense stats as the rumble continues. Outmaneuver your foes with clever tactics, unleash combos, and turn the tide with the perfect placement.
Open boosters to collect new heroes, level up your favorites by merging, and craft the perfect strategy in the deck-building menu. Unlock new arenas across magical worlds that change how you play. Whether you're a tactical mastermind or just love cute chibi chaos, Tiny Titans – Card Rumble delivers epic fun in tiny form!
70010000096337.intro: Exciting epic chibi heroes and fast, tactical card battles!
70010000096337.name: Tiny Titans - Card Rumble

70010000097420.description:
• Fight back against giant nature-infused beasts.
As a hunter, you will face off against beasts that have endured the blazing lava, raging blizzards, and rising miasma plaguing the harsh lands of Azuma. These beasts, known as Kemono, embody the very essence of nature in all its beauty and ferocity. The key to surviving the fight lies in joining forces with comrades and wielding Karakuri technology.

• Develop your hunting grounds using Karakuri technology.
Weaving the threads of Karakuri enables you to instantly create basic items like crates and gliders. You can even combine these items to develop Karakuri like beast-piercing blades, protective shields, and traps to stop movement in real time, all of which can aid you in your battle against the Kemono. There are also some Karakuri that will remain on the field, giving you the freedom to place them in strategic locations and create your own ideal hunting grounds.

• Customize your play experience with diverse combat styles.
The game features a wide range of equipment. From general weapons like the nodachi and bow, to unconventional ones like the karakuri katana and bladed wagasa, each weapon has unique characteristics. By utilizing materials gathered from the hunts to craft new equipment, hunters can persist in their pursuit of beasts. This ongoing cycle enables hunters to grow even stronger and challenge themselves in combat against numerous fearsome Kemono.

• The story and world:
No one remembers why the Kemono began their rampage through a once-prosperous Azuma. Fueled by desperation, they wield the power of primal nature at its most destructive. For a while, it seemed that none could stand against their overwhelming might. But hope arrives in the form of a formidable hunter armed with deadly weapons and ancient technology called Karakuri that could turn the tide of battle.

Note: In addition to the supported languages listed in the store, the game is also available in Spanish (Latin America) and Polish.
70010000097420.intro: Hunt giant beasts using a variety of Karakuri tech, now with up to 3 teammates!
70010000097420.name: WILD HEARTS S

70010000097822.description:
Iris the internet idol has been abducted by aliens?!
Finding herself on board a mysterious UFO and tasked with completing a bizarre escape game, Iris knows there's one person who she can always count on for help: Kaname Date, Psyncer! 
As Date, conduct investigations, solve escape game puzzles, and Psync into the dreams of potential suspects to help Iris escape and unravel the mystery behind The Third Eye Game!

・ Investigation: Use the special functions in Date's left eye to gather information that will lead to Iris's whereabouts! Familiar and new characters will also appear!
・Somnium: Explore the eccentric dream world of potential suspects to uncover clues and secret memories!
・ Escape: Solve thrilling mysteries while exploring a locked environment. When you find the true answer beyond the surface level of logic, the door to escape will open!
70010000097822.intro: Open Your Third Eye To Seek A Way Out!
70010000097822.name: No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES

70010000097925.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Uiwang-si (City), Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000097925.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Uiwang-si

70010000098787.description:
The objective is quite simple: each level contains numerous uncoloured pixels, and it is your job to colour them in. Each pixel is numbered; this number corresponds to a colour in your palette. Select a colour from the palette and paint each of its corresponding pixels. Correctly colour all pixels in a level to finish it!

Coloring Pixels is a great way to wind down, you can just sit back and relax. With 180 levels, you can have hours of fun. This collection contains 8 themed books:

Celtic Book - Patterns, traditions, and so much more! Explore the history of the Celtic people with this historical pack!

Isometric 3 Book - The third book of its kind offers various images and scenes, all designed in the isometric perspective!

Jungle Book - Images are of the wonderful wildlife you can only find in the jungles of our world! Get ready to explore and discover what wonders are hidden inside the dense underbrush of the Jungle!

Machines Book - Cogs and Gears and Pistons, oh my! Covering images of all kinds of machines and moving parts!

Microscopic Book - Images are things under the microscope! Put on your lab coat and discover what things look like up close!

Oceania Book - Images are of the amazing cultures from down under! Check out this whole ocean-based continent in pixel art!

Pets Book - Dogs, Cats, Lizards and more! Using inspiration from some real-life pets submitted by our players, deciding which is the most adorable is impossible!

Vistas 3 Book - The third of its kind, this DLC offers even more of the scenery, landscapes, and forests you love!
70010000098787.intro: A relaxing coloring-by-numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.
70010000098787.name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 6

70010000099358.description:
Let's make choco bananas on the Nintendo Switch™!
Dip each banana in chocolate and add a topping, making choco bananas to order!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make choco bananas to order!
Dip bananas in chocolate, decorate them with tasty toppings, and serve them up!
Make as many as you can before time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Prepare a banana and skewer it on a stick!

2. Dip the banana in chocolate! Choose from choco, matcha, strawberry and mint flavors!

3. When the chocolate has set, add a topping! Choose from sprinkles, sugar balls, and choco sauce!

4. When the chocolate has hardened, serve the choco banana!

[Score Attack]
Whip up as many choco bananas as possible and aim for the top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Compete with others and test your choco banana-making skills!
70010000099358.intro:
It's time for a cute choco banana-making challenge!
Make as many as you can, and watch your food cart prosper!
70010000099358.name: Make it! Choco Banana

70010000099387.description:
This is an action RPG released in Japan by T&E SOFT in 1989, and it is a powered-up version of “Hydlide 3” released in 1987. Players take on the role of an adventurer embarking on a journey to save Fairyland from crisis.

At the start, players create their own character through a character-making system, where they can choose from classes such as swordsman or priest. Each class has unique parameter characteristics. Repeating the character creation process until you’re satisfied can give you an advantage and is considered the first step to success—and part of the fun.

“3” inherits the graphics and sound from “2” but also improves the action elements—replacing body-check attacks with an attack button. Also, the game introduces new features such as class selection, the time, eating, and item weight, making it a well-balanced. This version includes added visual scenes, new maps, and new characters, offering more enjoyable experience. A classic loved by action RPG fans—give it a try.


*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000099387.intro:
Set off on an adventure to protect Fairyland, where humans and fairies coexist!
A powered-up version of Hydlide3 with new maps added.
70010000099387.name: EGGCONSOLE HYDLIDE3 S.V. PC-9801

70010000099649.description:
They said it was just a meme. A shout that echoed through the pre-dawn streets: “Tung tung tung… SAHUR!” Legend says if you hear the call three times and don’t respond… it will come for you.

Welcome to Tung Tung Tung Sahur REPORT, an online horror game where the cheerful call to eat before sunrise has become a haunting reminder of what was lost. You’re a scavenger, dropped into the cursed remains of a forgotten world, tasked with recovering valuable relics using your trusty physics-grabbing tool. Just one problem: you’re not alone.

Echoes follow you. Shadows move when they shouldn’t. And somewhere in the darkness, the tung tung tung is getting louder.

Search. Grab. Extract. Survive. The deeper you go, the weirder it gets—and the more the line blurs between meme and myth. Will you collect the lost pieces of civilization, or will you end up another late sleeper who didn’t answer the call?
70010000099649.name: Tung Tung Tung Sahur REPORT

70010000101235.description:
Step into the action with a high-intensity first-person shooter built for fast, competitive matches.

Choose your class, enter one of several epic battlegrounds, and unleash your full potential. Precision is everything — miss no shot, leave no enemy standing.

With adrenaline-pumping gunfights, tactical decision-making, and razor-sharp reflexes, dominate the battlefield your way and prove you're a true elite combatant.
70010000101235.name: FPS Bullet Storm

70070000027906.description:
Whether you're a seasoned sleuth, a trailblazing tactician,
 or a curious newcomer, the Explorers Edition is your passport to discovery. 

Uncover mysteries across continents and brave the wild frontier in this premium bundle celebrating two of gaming's most iconic adventures. For a generation of gamers, Carmen Sandiego and The Oregon Trail™ weren't just lessons, they were legends. From school computer labs to living room PCs, these global phenomenas sparked curiosity, shaped childhoods, and defined what it meant to learn through play. Now reimagined, they return for those who grew up with them and for the next generation ready to explore, survive, and discover.

THE OREGON TRAIL - Every choice matters. Every journey is your own.

A modern reimagining of the road to Oregon, this official successor to the iconic classic will fully immerse you in epic journeys ranging from the historically accurate to the totally extreme. Surviving blizzards, broken limbs, snakebites, exhaustion, starvation, and the dreaded dysentery is no small feat; all the while navigating an untamed frontier to get your party to their new life in Oregon before the winter.
Experience The Oregon Trail™ like never before!

Forge your path westward in a bold reimagining of the classroom classic -- complete  with historical depth, strategic gameplay, and that famously fatal dysentery.
Overcome hundreds of random events where your choices affect the fate of your travelers, and are influenced by their unique skills and traits.
Remember to take care of your party, wagon, and oxen, or they'll become casualties of the trail.

CARMEN SANDIEGO - It takes a thief to catch a thief.
VILE is back on the scene, and for once, ACME and Carmen Sandiego have a common enemy.
 In a rare and temporary alliance, the world's greatest thief must track down the syndicate before they can pull off their next big heist. 

Use spy tools such as gliders, grappling hooks, and thermal vision to solve crimes across global 
landmarks, outwit VILE operatives, and explore geography, culture, and critical thinking through stylish, story-driven gameplay.

From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world's most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.

Made for Curious Minds! 

This isn't homework, it's hands-on history. These games are trusted by educators and built to sharpen thinking, empathy, and curiosity in players of all ages.
•Designed for clever kids, nostalgic grown-ups, and lifelong learners
•Features classroom-ready extras and family-friendly support
•A perfect blend of play, purpose, and pixel-powered discovery
70070000027906.intro: Two Timeless Adventures. One Epic Journey of Wits and Survival.
70070000027906.name: Explorers Collection: The Oregon Trail & Carmen Sandiego Bundle

70010000098881.description:
Day of the Shell is a fast-paced tactical roguelite, where each turn is played in a single click.

The gods have brought down their wrath on humanity, and only a few remote islands remain. A lonely monster huntress has risen to challenge and appease the gods, traveling through what's left of the world.

FEATURES

 - One Click, One Turn: Tactical choices are made with a single click, making gameplay simple and dynamic while maintaining strategic depth.
 - Explore the Islands: Survive against monsters and collect treasures on each island to open its portal. Will you be able to reach the heart of the Islands and destroy the Shell?
- Shape Your Destiny: Combine the powers of the many Warden's blessings to fight your enemies. Different variations and combinations will allow you to create a unique playstyle for each game.
 - Death is Part of the Adventure: With each death, you return to your home island, where you can permanently upgrade or consider your strategy for the next day.
70010000098881.intro: Day of the Shell is a “one-click, one-turn” tactical rogue-lite
70010000098881.name: Day of the Shell

70050000058339.description:
Transform your office into the perfect workplace with the ARCHITECT'S HOME OFFICE pack, and design spaces where every detail enhances your creativity and focus!  

This pack includes 15 furniture and decor items to create the ideal office for an architect:  
   • A sloped drafting table and a stool
   • A set of architect’s tools
   • A modern desktop computer  
   • A wooden shelving unit
   • A wooden blueprint sideboard  
   • A basket of blueprints
   • Rolled-up blueprints  
   • A wooden articulated mannequin
   • A designer floor lamp  
   • A designer desk lamp  
   • A "Best Architect" mug  
   • Two exclusive indoor plants  
   • Two horizontal and vertical paintings with five variations each

Each item’s color can be freely customized via the color wheel.
70050000058339.name: Architect Life: A House Design Simulator - Architect's Home Office

70010000076840.description:
Welcome Home, Hobbit! – From the creative studio, Wētā Workshop, live the cosy life of a Hobbit in the wonderfully serene landscape of the Shire. Discover, decorate, and share in this idyllic corner of Middle-earth. Join friendly Hobbits and familiar faces awaiting your arrival in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings™ Game. 

Create your own Hobbit as you set forth in Bywater. Though not yet established as an official village in Hobbiton, play a part in helping the quaint town flourish. Greet comfort at the door as you decorate your own Hobbit hole, tend to your garden, fish at the clear ponds, forage wild fruits and herbs, or trade with townsfolks. Prepare homemade meals to share with fellow Hobbits and foster relationships.
With much to see and lots more to eat, enjoy days of splendor in the picturesque forests, lakes, and pastures. 

Unwind in the place where what matters most are all the little things. Help bring the community together to achieve village status in Bywater. Experience delight in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings™ Game.  


Key Features:

Welcome Home, Hobbit – Play as a Hobbit, directly out of J.R.R Tolkien's beloved books! Personalise your appearance and brandish your best Hobbit attire with an array of customisations. Decorate your own Hobbit home and transform the cosy space with grid-free placement to position furniture home décor to your liking. Discover the wonders each new day brings to Bywater as you settle into your serene homestead for much needed rest.

Food Is Love – No Hobbit’s day is complete without food. Fish, garden, and forage to stock up the pantry with the fruits of your labour. Harvest for seasonal crops and flowers as time passes in your homestead. Enjoy the warmth of the kitchen and show off your culinary chops with recipes for mealtimes. Partake in second breakfast or host a dinner party with fellow Hobbits. Share meals with invited guests to create new relationships. 

Explore Bywater – Explore the outdoors to discover secret glades and lost treasures of the Shire. Experience the ever-changing weather that affect daily routines and seasonal surprises based on time of year. Gain rewards through your story progression. Meet iconic characters and familiar Hobbit families to trade for upgrades to skills, clothes, home, and more. Join club missions to complete daily activities and help gain official village status in Bywater.
70010000076840.name: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of The Rings™ Game

70010000082894.description:
Craft your world. Survive the Wilds. Discover the secrets of the land.
Step into a handcrafted Wild West-inspired world in this relaxing isometric adventure RPG with light survival elements. Build, explore, farm, and fight as you piece together your own unique journey across shifting biomes and mysterious threats.


Shape the World Around You
Unleash your creativity by crafting a living world from over 100 modular world pieces. Each biome brings new materials, resources, and environmental challenges. Build, explore, and evolve your surroundings, one piece at a time.


Survive, Craft, and Thrive
Scavenge for resources, cook nourishing meals, and build vital workstations like furnaces, sawmills, and anvils. Master crafting to unlock powerful weapons, tools, and gear that help you hunt, fish, and face the dangers that lurk beyond.


Build Your Frontier Base
Use an intuitive modular system to create your personal outpost—from rustic cabins to cozy farms. Add furniture, plant a garden, and enjoy a peaceful sunset on your porch… before venturing back into the wild.


Farm and Flourish
Grow wild herbs and vegetables, maintain your crops with watering and fertilizer, and harvest the fruits of your labor. Farming is key to survival—and beauty—in your custom world.


Key Features:
- Build your own world with 100+ unique world pieces and biomes.
- Craft, cook, hunt, fish, farm, and fight in a cozy survival adventure.
- Modular building system with detailed customization options.
- Complete quests at your own pace and uncover a heartfelt story.
- Meet a mysterious cast and face off against the Lost Souls.
- Custom audio settings and photosensitive-friendly mode included.


Whether you’re settling in for a quiet evening of fishing or braving a dark biome full of Lost Souls, this is your world to build—and your story to tell.
70010000082894.intro: Grab your hat, boots, and bow and head into the wilderness. In Above Snakes, piece by piece, you’ll shape your own landscapes across this Wild West-inspired world builder.
70010000082894.name: Above Snakes

70010000090883.description:
Spell Disk is a rogue-lite action game with a unique synergy building mechanic so that your runs can never be the same. Strategize and create your own spell combo synergies to blast through enemies on your way! Each run is unique, so you must plan out how to build your power.

Discover combos and synergies that no one’s seen before! Maximize your power to better your chance of escaping the dungeon of Spell Disk.

Craft spells, disks, and artifacts during your run that synergies with each other in their own ways.

Unlock new weapons and powers to hack and slash through the enemies blocking your way.
70010000090883.intro: Build unique synergy spell combos to destroy the hordes of monsters and bosses in this rogue-lite action game.
70010000090883.name: Spell Disk

70010000092002.description:
Answer the Call. Protect the Light. Become an Arboranger.

Noctuary is a visual novel RPG that fuses rich storytelling, fast-paced action, and deep character progression. Step into the dual roles of Fancia Dream and Alina Nightsong, two bright-eyed Illuminators training to become legendary Arborangers - guardians of light in a world teetering on the edge of shadow.

Action Meets Heart
Fight back the darkness in real-time battles packed with explosive combo attacks, slick on-the-fly character switching, and game-changing Synergy skills. Master unique combat styles for both Fancia and Alina, and tailor your playstyle with strategic skill loadouts.

A World of Wonder, and Danger
Explore Inlixaland, a vibrant, fairy-tale realm teeming with magical creatures, mysterious secrets, and dangerous enemies known as the Darkritters. What begins as a lighthearted journey quickly deepens into a haunting tale as the girls uncover the truth behind a mysterious girl fallen from the sky.

Bonds That Power You
Build lasting friendships and fight alongside a cast of Illuminator companions. Your relationships matter, not just to the story, but to your survival. Equip and combine Blessing Petals, powerful relics infused with character abilities, to enhance your combat potential and personalize your approach to every fight.

Your Adventure, Your Way
With a multi-hour main storyline and over 20 side quests and branching character routes, Noctuary offers both emotional depth and high replayability. Discover personal stories, uncover hidden lore, and shape your path as a protector of light.
70010000092002.intro: Answer the call, protect the light, and forge your legend as an Arboranger in this heartfelt action RPG visual novel.
70010000092002.name: Noctuary

70010000092549.description:
Troublemaker blends favorite action-adventure-beat-'em-up elements from the strongest traditions in the genre. 
Go to school, make new friends, beat old enemies up, solve world-class problems (like grades and girlfriends), and don’t let your mom down by getting arrested or worse - flunking out!
As Budi, the new transfer to one of Indonesia's finest high schools, literally fight your way to the top of the social food chain through the school's annual student fighting tournament, aptly named Raise Your Gang.
Troublemaker is all about smooth and over-the-top combat in Indonesia's greatest adolescent combat arena. Punch, kick, break, smash, or gently swing Budi’s way up to the top with more than 30 iconic moves.
70010000092549.intro: Grab a backpack, boxing tape, and focus on what high school is all about: Beating the ever loving crap out of one another!
70010000092549.name: Troublemaker

70010000101240.description:
Jump, dodge and grab every tooth in a level to unleash a powerful lightning blast and save the captured fairy!

Join Hanoka, a brave fairy on a mission to rescue kidnapped tooth fairies from the clutches of mischievous junk food monsters in this fast-paced platformer inspired by many arcade classics.

Features:
- True Arcade feel with 36 levels and 6 bosses.
- Sweet But Deadly Foes
- Cute pixel art and beepy chiptune music
- Packed with extras! An Art Gallery, a Music Player, a Bestiary and even the game's prototypes.

9 out of 10 dentists recommend this game!
70010000101240.intro: Defeat the Junk Food and Rescue the Tooth Fairies!
70010000101240.name: Yosei Wars

70050000054626.intro: The dramatic RPG Fuga: Melodies of Steel series is now complete!
70050000054626.name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 - Cyberpunk Costume Pack

70010000081651.description:
The ultra-popular Japanese VTuber group hololive takes on the world of traditional Japanese card games in Holo's Hanafuda!

■What Is Hanafuda?
Hanafuda, Japanese for "flower cards," are traditional Japanese playing cards beloved by people of all ages. Twelve suits in total make up a deck, with each suit corresponding to a month of the year, and each card decorated with a unique and gorgeous illustration that depicts seasonal imagery matching the card's suit.

■Game Features
●Beginner-Friendly
Holo's Hanafuda comes with a robust suite of helpful features that simplifies play with on-screen markers and tips, making it easy to enjoy an array of hanafuda-based games without memorizing card values and rules.

●A New Twist on Hanafuda
Holo's Hanafuda introduces a brand-new twist on classic hanafuda gameplay with the Holo Awase rule variant! Use a deck of hanafuda cards that feature gorgeous hololive designs, then unleash powerful talent skills by matching cards that show the same hololiver in this koi-koi variant!

●Single-Player Story Mode
Join the hololive members you know and love as they enter a world inspired by hanafuda imagery. This immersive narrative adventure is chock full of banter, battles, and hololive vibes. Plus, it eases you into hanafuda gameplay by teaching you how to play!

●Multiplayer Gameplay
In addition to a healthy helping of single player options, you'll also be able to challenge players from across the globe in thrilling online matches. Pick your game, create a lobby or invite a friend, and hanafuda to your heart's content!

●Create and Share Handmade Bento Boxes
Design custom bento boxes in an in-depth bento mode! Collect points by playing games, then use them to unlock a wide variety of ingredients and decorations that you can mix, match and make bento magic with! Bentos always taste better when shared, so after you design your ideal bento, exchange your culinary creation with other players online!

■Characters
●Nakiri Ayame
“Greetings, Humans! Yoohoo!”
A kimono-clad Oni girl from the Underworld Academy. As she loves to prank people, she always uses will-o’-the-wisp on them just to have fun. Many may not realize it, but she is actually the president of the student council.

●Shirakami Fubuki
“Good foxy day! I'm Shirakami Fubuki!”
White-haired animal-eared otaku fox. She loves talking with people and will be happy if you give her the time of day.
She aims to become a top otaku idol while enjoying each and every day.

●Ookami Mio
“Hellooowl! It is Ookami Mio!”
A black-haired wolf girl who appeared on our radar randomly. She often shows up around shrines. She likes gaming.

●Sakura Miko
“Nya-hello~! I'm Sakura Miko, an elite shrine maiden-idol!”
A shrine maiden from the Virtual Sakura Shrine. With a vivid admiration for idols, she constantly pushes herself to greater heights to become a top elite shrine maiden-idol like no other!
Well... a self-proclaimed 'elite,' to be exact. Fans would think "clutz" fits her better...

...and more!

■Story
One otherwise normal day, hololive members Ayame, Fubuki, Mio, and Miko are suddenly drawn into a mysterious world full of hanafuda imagery. Soon, strange, shadowy figures appear to challenge the four to a series of high-stakes card battles that will decide the girls' fates! But hey, it's not all danger and darkness in hanafuda land—our heroines will also meet friends and allies along the way in this entirely original hololive hanafuda story!
70010000081651.intro: Holo's Hanafuda is a banter-filled card game battler fully voiced by and featuring hololive talent!
70010000081651.name: Holo's Hanafuda

70010000086460.description:
A NEW TWIST TO THE SIDE-SCROLLING NINJA GAIDEN SERIES EXPERIENCE

From the acclaimed team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound successfully unites the classic lore and gameplay of the Tecmo-developed (now KOEI TECMO GAMES) NINJA GAIDEN series from the classic era with the depth and intensity of the modern 3D entries. The best of both eras come together to create an epic and thrilling adventure.


DIVE INTO AN UNTOLD CHAPTER OF THE NINJA GAIDEN SAGA

Our story begins when Ryu Hayabusa journeys to America to honor his father's will. While he is away, the barrier between the human and the demon worlds suddenly shatters, unleashing a terrifying army upon the Hayabusa Village, which now faces an unprecedented threat in Ryu's absence.

To stand against this new threat, Kenji Mozu, a young ninja from the Hayabusa Village, rises to the challenge! Trained by Ryu, he fights fiercely but soon finds himself in desperate straits. Forced to tap into forbidden power, Kenji sets aside centuries of animosity and forms an alliance with the sinister Black Spider Clan, convinced that combining their souls and skills is the only way to protect the world out of the Demon Lord's grasp!


OLD SCHOOL GAMEPLAY WITH A BRAND-NEW POLISH

Combining old-school feeling with modern precision, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound retains the pick-up-and-play action of the classic titles, while introducing new layers of depth.

Alongside the new protagonist, Kenji Mozu, is the skilled assassin Kumori. Take control of these two powerful ninjas simultaneously and unravel their interconnected stories.

Use the Ninja Fusion to unleash devastating abilities and obliterate your enemies. NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound features impeccable mechanics that are easy to learn but hard to truly master, challenging the skills of even the most seasoned fans of the NINJA GAIDEN series!


A SPECTACULAR PIXEL ART SHOWDOWN

Step into a reimagined version of the classic NINJA GAIDEN universe, brought to life through stunning, meticulously crafted visuals. Every enemy is recreated with a level of detail that was once impossible.

The brutal, nostalgia-filled aesthetic of NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound pays homage to the past while pushing the boundaries of modern pixel art, making every battle a feast for the eyes.


Do you have what it takes to become a true ninja master?
70010000086460.intro: A new side-scrolling entry to the NINJA GAIDEN series from the Blasphemous team!
70010000086460.name: NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound

70010000087958.description:
As a member of the counter terrorist Spy Drops team, you are tasked with neutralizing a threat that could plunge the world into digital darkness, while you unknowingly get tangled in a deeper conspiracy.

Dropped behind enemy lines, your covert ops are to infiltrate infrastructure and undertake secret ops. While onsite you also need to make use of the Dream Catcher to extract intel from the minds of soldiers to discover the location of the next targets.

Missions are randomly generated producing a tense gameplay experience as you never know what is around the next corner. Everyone's game will be different.

You'll explore enemy bases room-by-room, choosing how to tackle each one, navigating past enemies who can see your shadow and hear your footsteps. You can dodge, hack or shot cameras, sneak past or knock out guards, scout the area with a drone, hide in lockers, or even wear sponge boots to move around quieter.

You're free to choose which equipment you take on each mission, choosing from drones, hacking devices, explosives, night vision googles and many more. Varying times of day and weather conditions can be a hindrance or provide cover, so you'll need to equip accordingly. New equipment and weapons are researched and added as the game progresses.

Take on a friend in local head-to-head multiplayer with Spy against Spy!
70010000087958.intro: 3D stealth action with modern effects, randomly generated missions, modern equipment, and local multiplayer!
70010000087958.name: Spy Drops

70010000092200.description:
◆Cardboard Town features:
- Various building cards to build your city from the ground up
- Action cards to take care of random events and adjust your cards
- Quest cards to abide and make your people happy
- Road cards to make cars go wroom wroom
- 9 Different Games Modes to enjoy!

◆Rogulite Fun:
With different upgrades, random festivals, disasters, and quests; each run is different!
Try to beat your high score each time and unlock even more random stuff such as new building cards, festivals, cosmetics and even resources!

◆Cardboard Town features over 100+ Building and Action cards, we are not even counting Quest cards, Festivals, Upgrades and Disasters.
With this large pool of options, you'll be able to build different cities each time! 


Want some more details?
Well, since you've scrolled this far and want to know more (thanks, by the way) let me just explain what the game is to you;
You take city-building games, add card mechanics and roguelite elements, you call it Cardboard Town (because cards and board and town, get it?) and it ends up being really cute and then you find yourself filling a Steam page, telling people about it. Cool, right?

You place Building Cards using Money and control your stats; Electricity, Water, Environment and Safety. Also, your Population determines how much Money you can have in a turn. 

Not being able to handle random disasters or failing to manage your stats gets you a Red Alert, get three and you're out!

With each run you unlock more cards, obtain better stats and options and try to beat your high score!
70010000092200.intro: Cardboard Town is a city-building card game. Manage your resources, obtain upgrades, draw your cards and thrive!
70010000092200.name: Cardboard Town

70010000095490.description:
You are the Lord of Hell, tasked with judging mortals who arrive for all kinds of reasons. Sometimes, you even have the power to resurrect certain individuals—changing the course of fate itself.

A variety of devilish girls each control unique resources in the underworld. To gain their support, you'll need to build strong relationships with them. Go on dates, get married, play cards, chat... and of course, enjoy all sorts of interactive minigames together to deepen your bond.

Heaven may be your enemy, but its angels don't all seem hostile. Try dining with them, giving gifts, and having heart-to-heart conversations... Can you date an angel too?
70010000095490.intro: Being the Lord of Hell is hard. One minute you're judging souls, the next you're speed-dating devils and writing love poems to angels.
70010000095490.name: Date with Devils

70010000096005.description:
In that moment you somehow are magically able to solve a seemingly impossible challenge...
A feeling of omnipotence washes over you, and you suddenly feel like you've become a great wizard!

Over 100 stages of puzzle after puzzle filled chambers that appear before you ceaselessly.
A novel puzzle game that anyone can have fun solving, but also makes anyone scratch their head and ponder!

[System]
Colored hearts rest above the heads of friends and foes alike.
Combine or push them away to defeat all the enemies and clear the stage!
Switch between our two heroines, Shirley and Ella, and use their unique skills to overcome the difficult challenges in store.

You needn't worry about difficult stages either.
The intuitive rewind system allows you to step back moves, and try them over and over again.

[Characters]
- Shirley Bancroft
A girl with an aptitude for magic. She has few emotional ups and downs and a naive side as well.
She also possesses the ability to see and manipulate the life force of her enemies.

- Ella
The 'beastfolk' warrior girl. She is bold, outspoken, and entirely fearless.
She cannot see or manipulate life force, but has the ability to change its color.

[Features]
- 100 puzzle stages in the primary game mode.
- 512 automatically generated stages that unlock after beating the game!
- Stage editor mode for making your own custom stages
- Game narrative and gameplay mechanics are cohesively integrated for an immersive story experience
- Hint system to help you clear any stages you may find tricky.
- Tons of hidden content to uncover
- Finally, the background of difficult stages are in black and white
70010000096005.intro:
Unravel the labyrinth's mysteries with your wits as your weapon!
A novel and stimulating brain-bending puzzle adventure!
70010000096005.name: The Wizard of Bug

70010000097958.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Hangang Park, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
High-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000097958.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Hangang Park

70010000098455.description:
Navigate your way through an aquarium overrun by gruesome creatures known as creepies and unravel its hidden mysteries. With each riddle you solve, you’ll find yourself one step closer to uncovering the chilling truth of Bianca Aquarium. Your choices affect the outcome of the game, so choose wisely.

This revamped version of The Aquarium does not dance includes the following updates:

- All five heroines are now fully voiced!
- A brand-new scenario titled "The Aquarium will always hunger"
- An updated and brand-new UI design plus event CG
- Full English localization!

CAST
Suze: Tomoyo Kurosawa
Retro: Yumiri Hanamori
Lulu: Satomi Sato
Kitty: Rie Kugimiya
Chrissy: Tomoe Tamiyasu

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
- Japanese
- English
- Korean
- Chinese (Traditional)
- Chinese (Simplified)
*Note: Character voicing is only available in Japanese.

SYNOPSIS
Having been gifted a premium pass to Bianca Aquarium, Suze and her best friend, Lulu, receive a guided tour led by the aquarium director’s charming wife, Chrissy. However, when Lulu suddenly goes missing, Suze goes looking for her and inexplicably finds herself in a strange and terrifying world that looks nothing like the aquarium she was at just moments ago. Can Suze find her best friend and escape from the nightmarish aquarium before it’s too late? Beware, for a traitor lurks in their midst...
70010000098455.intro:
Now on the Nintendo Switch™!
The new and improved hit game from 
the horror-hating horror game creator!
70010000098455.name: The Aquarium does not dance

70010000098930.description:
"Chop, stir, and sauté your way through the bustling solarpunk city of Helianthus. You play as Nori Kaga, a food cart chef aspiring to make it big like her role model, the Culinary Queen, Chef Rhubarb.

“Cook Serve Forever” is a brand new, story-rich cooking adventure from the creators of “Cook, Serve, Delicious!”

Features Include:

• Over 80 Foods and 400 recipes!
• 50 locations to master!
• 30 fully-voiced characters to meet - some friends, some foes!
• Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, perfect for casual and expert players alike!
• An amazing soundtrack by award-winning composer Jonathan Geer!
• An emotionally rich story full of mystery, love and ambition!

What are you waiting for? Let’s get cooking!"
70010000098930.name: Cook Serve Forever

70010000083865.description:
Join Ringo, a young martial artist looking for her brother, and Wolfe, a mysterious scoundrel running from his past, as they join forces in an unlikely partnership to collect the pieces of the fabled Wanderstar Map. Across 10 “episodes” of anime-inspired adventure, Ringo and Wolfe will have to work together to find answers, make up for past mistakes, and travel across the universe in search of their goal. And who knows, maybe they’ll learn how to get along at some point!

Trained in the ways of Kiai, a magical form of martial art and also the universe’s most exciting form of televised entertainment, Ringo can combine words to create customized attacks in intense turn-based battles. Defeat or befriend a cast of fearsome space pirates, mysterious scoundrels, cute witches, high school delinquents, talking crows, and skilled martial artists on your way to becoming a Kiai master.

USE YOUR WORDS
Create custom attacks by combining words up to the limit of your spirit level. The more spirit you have, the more slots you have to place words into and the more powerful and complex actions you can take.

All words have cool downs and opponents might be weak or strong against specific attacks or specific elements. You won’t know which until you engage them in battle so you need to be prepared to improvise.

COLLECT THEM ALL
With over 200 words to collect across the game there is a near infinite number of possible unique attacks to make. As you expand Ringo’s vocabulary you’ll need to carefully select which words you take into battle, building strategies around your mix of categories, blend of offensive and defensive words, giving yourself options to manage your opponents weaknesses and strengths, consider optimizing the juggling of cool downs and, of course, which attacks sound the coolest.

The result is an accessible, immediately fun but deep combat system.

STEP UP WITH PEP UPS
The core ethos of the Kiai martial art is to fight with honor. Defeating an opponent with honor can turn the most heated of rivals into the fastest of friends! Befriend your rivals to earn their words of encouragement in the form of useful Pep Ups which can be equipped to give you special bonuses in combat.

THE STARS CALL
Travel the universe on a rollercoaster adventure as you seek the pieces of the Wanderstar map, Ringo’s lost brother and the answers to Wolfe’s mysterious past.

UNLIKELY ALLIES
Along the way you’ll build a found family of colorful characters, each with their own thing going on. They might not all get along at first, but that’s nothing a thrilling space adventure can’t fix! And even with the trail gone cold, take heart, for these wandering stars are bound to find each other...

AN ANIME YOU CAN PLAY
Inspired by anime the developers grew up watching, Wander Stars plays out across 10 “episodes”, each one taking between 60-90 minutes to complete. Each episode features a map to explore with procedurally generated battles, special events and other secrets to find along with the main story events.
Play an episode at a time, or binge the whole thing in one go! You can even replay episodes to find all the side adventures, NPCs, and party member banter you might have missed! Try new paths as you explore ever-changing maps with randomized special events, lurking rivals, and tantalizing treasures. The experience is never quite the same!
70010000083865.intro: Unleash custom attacks by combining words in a Super! Anime! Turn-Based! RPG!
70010000083865.name: Wander Stars

70010000086952.description:
Please note this is the Standard Edition. Be aware there is also a Deluxe Edition available, so please ensure your selection before purchasing.

Destroy demons with the power of forged bonds!
Tanjiro Kamado's battle will once again unfold...

Single Player: Story Mode
Play as Tanjiro and relive the Entertainment District Arc, the Swordsmith Village Arc, and the Hashira Training Arc from the TV anime, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba!
Battle Upper Rank demons with your allies!

VS Mode: The Hashira unite!
The game features over 40 characters, including the nine Hashira, the highest-ranking swordsmen of the Demon Slayer Corps!
New elements, such as Dual Ultimates and Gear, have been added!
Take on new challenges both online and offline!

Standard Edition Content:
- Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 Main Game
- Digital Version Bonus - Character Unlock Keys: Academy Rengoku and Academy Uzui 

Bonus for linking save data:
The following bonuses will be available for players with save data from Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles or Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- Sweep The Board!
- Bonus for Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles save data:
Character Unlock Keys: Academy Tanjiro, Academy Nezuko, Academy Zenitsu, Academy Inosuke, Academy Giyu. Academy Shinobu
- Bonus for Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- Sweep The Board! save data:
Character Unlock Key: Hinatsuru, Makio and Suma
Battle Attire: Hinatsuru, Makio and Suma Kimono (Meal Prep)

*Character Unlock Keys are bonuses that allow you to play the specified character in VS Mode at the very start.
*Battle Attire can be used in VS Mode.
*Bonuses for linking save data are only applicable for games on the same platform.
*Online play in VS Mode requires a Nintendo Switch™ Online membership (paid).
*The latest patch must be installed in order to use online features.
*Contents and specifications are subject to change without notice.
*The digital version bonuses are permanent.
